thread.title: Dollar Tree Swings to a Loss
thread.title_full: Dollar Tree Swings to a Loss

title: Dollar Tree Swings to a Loss
text:
Dollar Tree Swings to a Loss, Though Sales Soar After Deal Discount retailer pulls per-share earnings guidance for the full year By lisa.beilfuss@wsj.com Sept. 1, 2015 8:35 a.m. ET 
Dollar Tree Inc. swung to a loss in its latest quarter, though sales jumped, as the discount retailer integrates its recently-acquired rival. 
Shares in the company fell 5.3% in premarket trading, erasing much of their year-to-date gain. 
The Virginia-based chain, which in July completed its $9 billion acquisition of Family Dollar Inc.,... To Read the Full Story, Subscribe or Sign In Popular on WSJ
